summary: The Pinkerton detective agency uncovers a plot to assassinate President James Garfield in 1881 Texas. The film, a "political" Spaghetti, is a very overt mirroring of the JFK Assassination in 1963.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Warren Vanders|María Cuadra|Ray Saunders|Fernando Rey|Antonio Casas|Benito Stefanelli|María Luisa Sala|Ángel Álvarez|Massimo Carocci|Norma Jordan|Ángel del Pozo|Julio Peña|Franco Meroni|Luis Rico|Francisco Sanz|Manuel Zarzo|José Suárez|Van Johnson|Charly Bravo|Frank Braña|José Calvo|José Canalejas|Michael Harvey|Lisardo Iglesias|Ralph Neville|Joaquín Parra|Riccardo Pizzuti|Lorenzo Robledo
keywords: pinkerton detective agency|pinkerton detective|italo western|assassination of president|united states of america
title: La muerte de un presidente
